about_the_game:
~ Story ~

Mamizou Futatsuiwa, the boss of the haunted raccoon dogs,

checks on the changes in the raccoon dogs under his command!

But Mamizou is too busy to spend much time on this.

You have to quickly find out the changes in a short period of time!

1. About this game

This is a speedy mistake-finding game, a derivative of Touhou Project!

(this is fangame.)

2. Check the wrong parts compared to the sample!

The parts to be checked are roughly divided into three parts: head, upper waist, and lower waist.

Compare with the sample and select “OK” for the correct part and “NG” for the wrong part!

There are various kinds of mistakes, such as the color of the parts,

the presence or absence of decorations, differences in the belongings, etc.

Some of them may be completely different from the sample...

3. Speed up the game by answering correctly in a row!

If you answer 3 questions in a row correctly without making a mistake,

the game speed will increase!

You will be able to check more raccoon dogs!

4. Various characters appear!

The characters that will change are the well-known Touhou characters!

As you advance through the stages, more characters will appear!

If you know the characters well,

you may be able to recognize them without comparing them with the samples!

5. Finally

Enjoy!!

name: Mamizou's Mimic Check
short_description: Touhou Project's secondary Speedy Mistake-finding game!Check for errors in the content of the changes! The speed increases when you get consecutive correct answers!Let's check if the various Touhou characters are correct!
